package.name: OpenBGPD
package.descr: OpenBGPD is a free implementation of the Border Gateway Protocol, version 4. It allows ordinary machines to be used as routers exchanging routes with other systems speaking the BGP protocol.<br /> <strong>WARNING! Installs files to the same place as Quagga OSPF. Installing both will result in a broken state, remove this package before installing Quagga OSPF.</strong>
